ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: Lag at the Bazaar
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah. I got ya. Yeah, there have been some people constantly bitching in EC about how EC is dead and blah blah blah. Carrying on about why people aren t
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah. I got ya. Yeah, there have been some people constantly bitching in
EC about how EC is dead and blah blah blah. Carrying on about why people
aren't selling there anymore and stuff. I personally like having less people
there spamming for sales. Made it easier to sell my Ring of the Frost
Spiders (btw, I found that actually advertising the stats of the item got
instant attention-- one guy was trying to sell the same item but not saying
the stats. I advertised it just to show the stats for him and immediately
got tells from people who wanted it).
I wonder what Planes of Power is going to do in terms of clearing out the
zones..
luv,
-Su

> I don't think anyone on here has lashed out at Verant but I know several
> have during game play, that comment was mostly meant for them.
> It's a new thing so yea people are going to flock to it. I personally
> haven't been there yet. I was told you need the Luclin expansion for it.
> Don't have that one, heck I just picked up the Ruins expan yesterday!
> Lol!
> I have to admit I personally am enjoying the little amount of people in
> the game, I'm getting a hold of a lot of great stuff and making some
> decent plat amounts. I've been able to get all the items I need for my
> quests and so forth. Today I was surprised and happy to see a few people
> running around in Steamfront.
>
> Anyway back to my quests!
>
